enhanced_by.reason: The distance method relies on the state of the LineDouble instance, which is set up by the create method.
The mbr method provides the minimum bounding rectangle, which can be used to set up the environment for distance calculations.
Both methods involve geometric calculations with rectangles, making the output of intersects useful for asserting the correctness of distance calculations.
The GeometryUtil.distance method calculates distances similar to the target method, providing a basis for assertions.
